Hauser Junior High Science Olympiad Team State Bound
Invitation to Participate in Speak Up Survey

div.p: Our mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society. We are “Committed to Excellence,” and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community.

At the Flat Rock-Hawcreek School Corporation we believe each child is capable of reaching his/her full potential. Our educators value a reflective practice that honors each child’s uniqueness in a learner-centered environment. As a district, we work hard to create a sense of family where all stakeholders are supported and each member of our community is valued and respected. Our Teachers serve as models of life long learning and collaboration while striving to make each class relevant for their students.
If you take a few moments to look a little deeper you will find two schools, Hauser Jr./Sr. High School and Hope Elementary, both with a deep tradition and expectation of excellence that have a shared vision of education for all students.
If you have questions along the way or want to come take a closer look, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Shawn Price
Superintendent
Flat Rock-Hawcreek School Corporation
